main event: A witness observed a bright unidentified flying object in Big Sur, California on January 21, 1966, for about 2 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared to move slowly in a straight line across the sky., The witness described the object as solid and a white, silvery color., It was brighter than the planet Venus and dimmed and brightened during the sighting., The object was estimated to be large, around 100 feet in diameter., The sighting involved two other witnesses who corroborated the observation.
sighted object: one bright light, described as disc-shaped
witness description: a male, age 32, who claimed limited prior experience with UFO reports
